General.Name: Chengdu Yunda Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Yunda Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on the development, production, and sale of rail vehicle system testing and control equipment in China. The company offers train driving, station attendant, dispatcher training, and rail integrated simulators, as well as railway rescue crane simulation training systems; and distributed logic control and detecting units in locomotives, and intelligent display units for trains, TCN complete train control systems, locomotive safety and fire protection monitoring systems, monitoring devices for the running gear of locomotives, and brake logic control units. It also provides track management automation systems, automation safety work platforms, integrated classes, and works disaster prevention systems; and metro security platforms, track management automation systems, locomotive equipment management information systems, management information systems for locomotive maintenance, and integrated management systems for servicing operations. Chengdu Yunda Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Chengdu, China. The company is a subsidiary of Chengdu Yunda Innovative Technology Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: High-tech Industrial Development Zone, Chengdu, China, 611731
